item.title: About Me
item.description: I am currently a data engineer at the Federal Reserve Board in the Flow of Funds section of the Research and Statistics division. Prior to my almost 2 years of experience as a data engineer, I was a research assistant at the Board. Before coming to the Board, I graduated from Wesleyan University with a major in Economics, and a minor in Data Science, and high honors on my Thesis. I am currently in the process of obtaining my masters in Data Science from Northwestern University.

item.title: Contact
item.description: My school email is harrisonkarp2025@u.northwestern.edu and my work email is Harrison.Karp@frb.gov.
